site_description: We sell the best stuff everywhere. Everyone loves it. The best cameras. The best plants. The best sofas. We don't really ship anything. This is a sample site. Satisfaction guaranteed.
about_us_description: Learn more about our company, our mission, and what drives us to deliver the best products and services.
aboutDescription: Discover our story, values, and the passionate team behind {name}
heroSubtitle: For over a decade, we've been committed to bringing you the finest products with exceptional service
storyContent1: What started as a small family workshop in 2010 has blossomed into an international e-commerce destination. Our founder, {founder}, began crafting handmade jewelry at her kitchen table, driven by a passion for sustainable fashion.
storyContent2: Today, we partner with over 200 artisans worldwide, bringing you unique, ethically-made products while maintaining that personal touch that started it all.
valueDescription: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore.
valueDescription2: Lorem   ipsum 2 dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore.
hero_description: We sell the best stuff anywhere.  Everyone loves it.  The best cameras.  The best plants.  The best sofas.  We don't actually ship anything.  This is an example site.  Satisfaction guaranteed.
shipping_taxes_checkout: Shipping and taxes will be calculated at checkout.
collections_description: Explore our carefully curated collections of high-quality products.
verification_email_sent: Verification email sent to your email address
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again
account_email_sent: If an account with that email exists, a reset code has been sent.
create_account_big: Welcome! To create an account, please enter your email and choose a password below.
account_reset_pass: Enter your email address to receive an email with a link to change your password.
login_text: If you have an existing account, enter your email and password below.
name: Name
introduction: We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.
informationCollectionContent: We may collect personal identification information including but not limited to name, email address, and usage data when you interact with our services.
dataUsageContent: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.
dataProtectionContent: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access and data breaches.
userRightsContent: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.
changesContent: We may update this policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated through our website or email.
contactUs: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at {email}.
orderIntroduction: These terms outline our ordering process, delivery procedures, and return policies. Please read carefully before making a purchase.
orderProcessContent: Orders can be placed through our website 24/7. You'll receive an order confirmation via email immediately after successful payment.
paymentMethodsContent: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and mobile payments. All transactions are securely processed through encrypted channels.
deliveryOptionsContent: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping available for additional fee. Digital products delivered immediately via email.
returnsContent: Unopened items can be returned within 14 days of delivery. Contact us for return authorization. Digital products are non-refundable.
liabilityContent: We are not responsible for delays caused by carriers or customs. Damaged items must be reported within 48 hours of delivery.
orderContact: For order-related inquiries, contact us at {email}.
contactIntroduction: Get in touch with us through any of the following methods. We're here to help!
contactSuccessMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll respond within 24 hours.
mapPlaceholder: Map placeholder - integrate your map service here
paytrail: Pay by paytrail. Finnish payment service where you can find all Finnish banks
error_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
reset_instructions_sent: Password reset instructions sent to your email
info_welcome: Welcome to our information hub. Here you can learn more about our company, explore helpful guides, and get in touch with us.
info_our_mission_description: We strive to deliver exceptional quality and service in everything we do, ensuring our customers achieve their goals.
info_services_description: From innovative solutions to comprehensive support, our services are designed to meet your unique needs.
title: Reset Your Password
passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain numbers and letters
errorMessages_passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 4 characters long
cookie_banner_description: I serve my visitors cookies to provide them with the best possible experience. Cookies allow me to analyze user behavior in order to constantly improve my website.
password_reset_link_sent: password reset link sent to your email.
cookie_policy_description: Learn how we use cookies to enhance your experience.
cookie_policy_intro: We use cookies to provide a better user experience, analyze site traffic, and improve our services.
what_are_cookies_content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to help websites function properly and remember your preferences.
how_we_use_cookies_content: We use cookies for essential functions, performance analysis, and personalized content.
cookie_types_content: Essential cookies, analytics cookies, marketing cookies, and preference cookies.
manage_cookies_content: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie banner.
country_min_length: Country must be at least 2 characters long
selection_error: An error occurred while selecting the country
filter_error: An error occurred while filtering countries
deliveryInfo: For the campaign, it is only possible to order home-delivery on 4.12 and 20.12. The order must be placed for the first day on 28.11 at 11:30 and for the second day on 16.12 at 11:30.
deliveryInstructions: Detailed instructions for home delivery e.g. call the phone, send an SMS when delivering, etc.
